text:
e="preserve">Alain Cacheux (November 15, 1947 – July 26, 2020) was a French politician. He was a member of the National Assembly of France from 1997 to 2002 and again from 2007 to 2012. He represented the Nord department. He was a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche.
Cacheux died of a heart attack on July 26, 2020 at the age of 72.

annotations.surface_form: Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche
